title: StartMother
body:
State your intentions for my son, young lady! 
[[I want to marry Wentzel. He's so dreamy.|MotherGood01]]
[[I want to get to know Wentzel better.|MotherNeutral01]]
[[I'm just here for the cherry blossoms. |MotherBad01]]

title: MotherGood01
body:
So, you're only interested in him because of his looks? 
[[Of course not. I admire everything about him.|MotherGood02]]
[[Of course not. I love his personality just as much.|MotherNeutral02]]
[[Of course. His body is to die for.|MotherBad02]]

title: MotherBad01
body:
Aren't they lovely this time of year, dear?
[[Almost as lovely as Graf Von Azabu.|MotherNeutral02]]
[[Yes, I love how they shimmer in this light.|MotherBad02]]
[[No, I was just kidding.|MotherBad02]]

title: MotherNeutral01
body:
You don't even know him yet? How did you get invited here?
[[Graf Wentzel invited me.|MotherGood02]]
[[You invited me.|MotherNeutral02]]
[[Fr√§ulein Hilf invited me.|MotherBad02]]

title: MotherGood02
body:
So, tell me what exactly you like about my son!
[[His kind heart radiates brighter than the afternoon sun.|MotherGoodEnding]]
[[His smile is white like the cherry blossoms in Spring.|MotherGoodEnding]]
[[I was smitten by his 'large donations'.|MotherNeutralEnding]]

title: MotherNeutral02
body:
So, tell me what exactly you like about my son!
[[I was smitten by his 'large donations'.|MotherNeutralEnding]]
[[His article on compiling the Japanese national postal code guide was fascinating.|MotherNeutralEnding]]
[[He has very nice friends.|MotherBadEnding]]

title: MotherBad02
body:
My, my you don't mince your words, do you? 
[[On that we may have something in common.|MotherNeutralending]]
[[Why should I?|MotherBadEnding]]
[[Not for you, at least.|MotherBadEnding]]
